info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Dangerous Lightning will impact portions of northeastern New Hanover and southeastern Pender Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hampstead, or near Rich Inlet. This storm was drifting south. HAZARD...Dangerous cloud to ground lightning. Torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Locations impacted include... Figure Eight Island, Rich Inlet, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Murrayville, Topsail, Bayshore, Scotts Hill, Ogden and Porters Neck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
